name: Triggered Day
description:
In this simple multiplayer shooter you play as a gun that cannot move by its own. However, you can move by shooting, and you can shoot many things:

  • Shoot bots
  • Shoot other players
  • Shoot yourself

Your goal is to get the highest score by killing everything you see! To achieve the goal you get 2 shot types and a shot upgrade you can find on the map.

Controls:

  • Shoot normally with LMB or a quick touch
  • Shoot heavily with RMB or by holding your touch
